generated_summaries:
Palestinian Authority officially became the 123rd member of the International Criminal Court .

A stray dog in Washington State has been hit by a car, whacked on the head with a hammer, buried in a field and then miraculously survived .
Theia, now a friendly white-and-black bully breed mix, is still recovering from her ordeal .
Donors have already surpassed the $10,000 target for her medical bills .
